overview:
Senior Software Consultant / Entrepreneur

Perrin Mobley is the founder, managing member and senior consultant for ExpertsHired, LLC; a software consulting and web design firm that provides technology solutions to small businesses, government agencies and non-profit organizations. He also is the founder of StoreFlyy.com; a mobile and web ecommerce platform for small businesses. He attended the University of Alabama in Tuscaloosa and received a Bachelor of Science in Management Information Systems and Computer Software Systems.

Perrin has over ten years in the information technology industry and has consulted many clients including The University of Alabama, Southern Company, Russell Athletics, HBCU Title III Administrators, and the U.S nuclear power industry. His experience has allowed him to hone his expertise through successful ventures such as: founding Mobleyinc, LLC; a technology and investment holding company that invests in technology related start-ups. He continues to work with many start-up ventures and co-operates several e-commerce stores including LGNTees.com and MenLuxuryStore.com and many more.
